name: UpdateEventType
description:
Update details of an existing event type with Calendly.

Use this tool to update an existing one-on-one event type in Calendly. This tool is specifically for modifying event types categorized as 'solo' or one-on-one.

parameters.name: event_type_uuid
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the event type to be updated. This is essential for specifying which one-on-one event type you intend to modify.

parameters.name: event_details
parameters.description: JSON object containing details to update an event type, including active status, name, color, description, duration, duration options, locale, and locations.

active.description: Indicates if the event type is active or not

color.description: The hexadecimal color value of the event type's scheduling page

duration.description: The length of sessions booked with this event type. Must be one of the duration options if they're provided.

duration_options.description: A maximum of 4 unique options is allowed. Each option must be >= 1 and <= 720.

locale.description: The locale on the event type, used to determine the language of the event type's scheduling page

locations.description: Configuration information for each possible location for this Event Type

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the calendly API.

active.description: Indicates if the event type is active or not

duration.description: The length of sessions booked with this event type. Must be one of the duration options if they're provided.

locale.description: The locale on the event type, used to determine the language of the event type's scheduling page

locations.description: Configuration information for each possible location for this Event Type

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
